properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 3:23AM EST until January 9 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water
levels. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25
knots with gusts up to 35 knots and waves 2 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from The Islands to
Vermilion OH.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, until 6 AM EST early this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Low Water Advisory, the water level
at Toledo was 29 inches above low water datum at 3 AM. The water
level is expected to decrease to just below the critical level
mark of 23 inches above low water datum until 6 AM.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST THURSDAY
